item.title: Herts Sunday cross country league 21/22 review
item.description: It was great news when I heard that the club had arranged for us to take part in the Herts Sunday cross country league, the winter sister competition to our usual summer interclub competition. As I prepared, I was very pleased to find that I’d had some forethought 2 years ago, and had loosened the spikes in the cross country shoes, so they werenâ€™t rusted in place…
